name: The Ghan Expedition Darwin to Adelaide with Charles Darwin Sunset Dinner Cruise
description:
Lap up one of Darwin's spectacular sunsets over dinner on board Darwin Harbour Cruises. The next morning, be transferred from your accommodation (as booked by you) to join your four-day three-night Ghan Expedition rail journey that will take you into the nation's heart. In addition to exploring Katherine on your first day of this all-inclusive adventure, there is a full day of touring Alice Springs that concludes with dinner under the stars, plus another full day exploring the truly unique underground mining town of Coober Pedy. Wake-up on your final day to a view of the Flinders Ranges outside your window before arriving in Adelaide.
Please Note: Accommodation is not included

departures.bookingKey: The Ghan Expedition Darwin to Adelaide with Charles Darwin Sunset Dinner Cruise 14 May 2024

priceTypes.terms: This fare is a discounted fare and is subject to availability. 25% cancellation fees apply when cancelling more than 45 days prior to departure. 100% cancellation fees apply 45 days and under prior to departure.

A 25% deposit is due upon booking. Final payment is due 45 days prior to departure. Cancelling more than 45 days prior to departure will result a loss in deposit. 100% cancellation fees apply if cancelled 45 days or less than departure.
Changes are permitted up to 1 day prior to departure. Fully refundable up until 1 day prior to departure.
